title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 54.4 - Records to be kept by pilots
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 54.4 - Records to be kept by pilots

State Regulations

Pilots individually or through their association shall keep
such records of their activities as the board shall reasonably require to
insure compliance with these regulations and any other applicable laws. Such
records shall be in a format approved by the board and shall be available at
all times for inspection by the board. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
54.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
